verbose_text: Furthermore, C/EBPalpha can directly repress S-phase driving genes either forming a complex with EF2 or binding directly to the CCAAT consensus site in these genes and suppress their transcription [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: C/EBPalpha can directly repress S-phase driving genes either forming a complex with EF2 or binding directly to the CCAAT consensus site in these genes and suppress their transcription
